AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: spider tinkerer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] loved tikering with various machines, especially spiders. It was a common sight to see [PAWN_pronoun] reprimanded by technicians upon being discovered as the cause of the newest malfunction.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fungus enthusiast
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Unlike other kids, [PAWN_nameDef] loved fungus and refused to eat anything that didn't contain it. This greatly overjoyed the local cultivators who saw both a future customer and worker.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tonal student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a student of the complex subject of tonal architecture, learning from a young age how to manipulate sound waves. During [PAWN_possessive] time off, [PAWN_pronoun] would build small prototypes using [PAWN_possessive] newfound knowledge.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tonal architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Few were as respected as the tonal architects [PAWN_nameDef] was part of. Together they would construct wonderful contraptions furthering the development of their civilisation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: aminunculi tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a tender of aminunculi, making sure their joints moved smoothly and that they didn't have any electric discharge. Unfortunately, during one such inspection, part of [PAWN_possessive] brain got fried, never the same again.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: aminunculi architect
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Every aminunculi had a creator such as [PAWN_nameDef], designing them with care and the expectation that they would last millennia. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] would design small prototypes to scare [PAWN_possessive] friends with, much to their dismay.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fungus cultivator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Every Dwemer knows the important of fungus, one of the few plants growing underground. [PAWN_nameDef] knew it even better, down to the exact shade that indicated sickness, the expected harvest, and the income after selling [PAWN_possessive] stock.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: librarian
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never cared for people, preferring the silent solace of books. Once the day came, [PAWN_pronoun] applied to be a librarian, greatly enjoying chastising anyone who disturbed [PAWN_possessive] sacred place.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tonal smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While the tonal architects worked, [PAWN_nameDef] would construct the parts they would use. No matter how small, each cog was an important part of the machine, just as every Dwemer to the Kingdom.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: diplomat
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While most Dwemer stayed underground, [PAWN_nameDef] would travel around the world to maintain the few relations they still had. Usually the nation was the Chimer empire, arguing with the great houses over their worship of Daedra.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: emissary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] would accompany the diplomats whenever tensions arose with other nations. While the others argued about faith, [PAWN_nameDef] would take notes of anything interesting they could bring home to study.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: arbalest
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Few were as skilled with arbalests as [PAWN_nameDef], whose nickname became synonymous with the weapon. To keep enemies on their toes, [PAWN_pronoun] would constantly try to design new types of bolts, each more dangerous than the last.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: PLACEHOLDER

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: statue maker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the statue makers comissioned to make grand statues commemorating the great deeds of the Dwemer empire, and even grander ones for the king who claimed the honor. After a long day of work, [PAWN_pronoun] would relax with the others at the local sauna.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: astronomer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days researching the stars and recording their alignments. Their work was commonly cited amongs fellow scholars.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scholar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an esteemed scholar, specialising in the divine arts. Disgusted by aedra and daedra alike, [PAWN_pronoun] took great pleasure in the thought that one day the Dwemer will surpass them as the new gods of Nirn.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: puzzle box creator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: One day, [PAWN_nameDef] woke up and had a great idea, to make a puzzle cube. Once finished, [PAWN_nameDef] made sure to hide it as well as possible, feeling deep satisfaction over the thought that one day, an adventurer will be tasked with finding it.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: PLACEHOLDER

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: slaver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While outdoor slavers relied on primitive methods such as weapons and traps, [PAWN_nameDef] used tonal contraptions to charm [PAWN_possessive] victims into following along. The resulting goods were undamaged, and willing to serve any master as long as the tunes kept singing in their brains.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tonal medic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a practicioner of tonal medicine, using sound waves to treat complex issues in [PAWN_possessive] patients. [PAWN_nameDef] always had positive reviews, as the patients left the clinic feeling nothing but bliss.
